title: Terrible lagging/Gliding in-game
body:
Hi! Lately I've been having these issues in game:

- Champions keep gliding around
- No walking animation, but suddenly everyone has shifted
- Delays when clicking to move or pressing abilities (for example, I press Q on Thresh but the hook seems to go out literally one or two seconds after I've pressed the button)
- Ping spikes to over 400 ms (I play from Asia, but it's usually around 200 ms which is playable for me)

I play on a Macbook Pro, no Ethernet.
Can anyone see if this is just a classic Wi-Fi problem, or something else? Thanks!

replies.body: I've been having the EXACT same problem but I'm using wired internet. I don't see any issues with my connection so I'm not sure what to do.

Input delays are usually caused by lag spikes or network issues failing to hold a steady connection.  To be honest, playing on Wifi can certainly be a culprit of this.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this, starting with a wired connection if possible.  Make sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
